caseStudies.title: Poster Design for CUET Club Event
caseStudies.problem: Robotics Club needed a poster urgently for their workshop.
caseStudies.solution: A CSE student designed a clean poster in Figma and delivered it within 3 hours.

caseStudies.title: Python Bug Fix for EEE Project
caseStudies.problem: Sensor data logger script kept crashing during execution.
caseStudies.solution: A student fixed the index error and optimized the loop.

caseStudies.title: PPT Design for Presentation
caseStudies.problem: A student needed a visually appealing 12-slide PPT for a project defense.
caseStudies.solution: A junior created a clean, professional template with icons and animations.
